issue.title: [C++][Python] Refactor python to arrow conversions based on a reusable conversion API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9992](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9992). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have a lot of technical debt accumulated in the python to arrow conversion code paths including hidden bugs. We need to simplify the implementation.
